ivardefs.name: allergyIntolerance_
ivardefs.desc: A link to a record of allergies or intolerances  which should be included in the nutrition order.

ivardefs.name: dateTime
ivardefs.desc: The date and time that this nutrition order was requested.

ivardefs.name: encounter
ivardefs.desc: An encounter that provides additional information about the healthcare context in which this request is made.

ivardefs.name: enteralFormula
ivardefs.desc: Feeding provided through the gastrointestinal tract via a tube, catheter, or stoma that delivers nutrition distal to the oral cavity.

ivardefs.name: excludeFoodModifier_
ivardefs.desc: This modifier is used to convey order-specific modifiers about the type of food that should NOT be given. These can be derived from patient allergies, intolerances, or preferences such as No Red Meat, No Soy or No Wheat or  Gluten-Free.  While it should n

ivardefs.name: foodPreferenceModifier_
ivardefs.desc: This modifier is used to convey order-specific modifiers about the type of food that should be given. These can be derived from patient allergies, intolerances, or preferences such as Halal, Vegan or Kosher. This modifier applies to the entire nutrition o

ivardefs.name: identifier_
ivardefs.desc: Identifiers assigned to this order by the order sender or by the order receiver.

ivardefs.name: oralDiet
ivardefs.desc: Diet given orally in contrast to enteral (tube) feeding.

ivardefs.name: orderer
ivardefs.desc: The practitioner that holds legal responsibility for ordering the diet, nutritional supplement, or formula feedings.

ivardefs.name: patient
ivardefs.desc: The person (patient) who needs the nutrition order for an oral diet, nutritional supplement and/or enteral or formula feeding.

ivardefs.name: status
ivardefs.desc: The workflow status of the nutrition order/request.

ivardefs.name: supplement_
ivardefs.desc: Oral nutritional products given in order to add further nutritional value to the patient's diet.
